mapper.sql: id, imei, lordpower, signalxhao, bluetooth_type AS bluetoothType, eq_status AS eqStatus, createtime, updatetime, eqtype, bluetooth_name AS bluetoothName, bluetooth_status AS bluetoothStatus, bluetooth_list AS bluetoothList, bluetooth_electricity AS bluetoothElectricity, clock, phone1, phone2, name, version, uploadtime, bluetoothmac, agentid, model
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) AS count,SUM(CASE WHEN eq_status='H:0' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS online,SUM(CASE WHEN eq_status='H:1' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS offline FROM equipment tp INNER JOIN (SELECT * from user WHERE isDelete=0 AND role='使用者') tv ON tp.imei=tv.imei INNER JOIN agent tt ON tp.agentid=tt.id INNER JOIN (SELECT * FROM admin WHERE id=#{adminId}) tk ON tt.id=tk.agentId

SELECT HRV,sbp_ave,dbp_ave,Heartrate,Bloodoxygen,microcirculation,respirationrate,tt.createtime FROM user_eq tp LEFT JOIN equipment tc ON tp.eq_id=tc.id LEFT JOIN jfhealthdao tt ON substring(tt.phone,9)=tp.user_id WHERE tc.imei=#{imei} AND tp.typeof=2
SELECT tt.id as agentId,tc.* FROM admin tp LEFT JOIN agent tt ON tp.agentId=tt.id LEFT JOIN equipment tc ON tt.id=tc.agentid WHERE tp.id=#{adminId} AND tc.imei=#{imei}
